title: Has the House of Representatives approved a bill allowing government contractors to expel lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) persons?
subtitle: The House of Representatives and the Senate were hampered by the Defence Bill, which included language critics who said that it would allow government contractors to discriminate against lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) persons.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The House of Representatives passed a bill allowing government contractors to discriminate against LGBT persons.
